numCPUs.content: numCPUs → int (Read Only): The number of CPUs/cores on the system.

ram.content: ram → float (Read Only): Amount of available RAM memory.

numMonitors.content: numMonitors → int (Read Only): The number of monitors.

xres.content: xres → int (Read Only): The system's current monitor resolution width.

yres.content: yres → int (Read Only): The system's current monitor resolution height.

tfs.content: tfs → str (Read Only): The path to the TFS directory.

MIDIInputs.content: MIDIInputs → list[str] (Read Only): A list of all MIDI Input device names.

MIDIOutputs.content: MIDIOutputs → list[str] (Read Only): A list of all MIDI Output device names.
